item.description:
The Festival of Trees is a four day event designed to be a holiday activity. The mission is to raise money to help fight the battle against breast cancer and help fund cancer research.

Holiday spirit returns with the Annual Festival of Trees. Enjoy the beauty of over 80 sparkling and uniquely- decorated holiday trees. Take raffle chances to win one, tree and all! All trees are donated by families and businesses and many are in rememberance of loved ones who have passed. The themes are endless and are certain to get you into the spirit of the holidays! There is entertainment, raffles, and refreshments. Admission is $3.

After the viewing we will go to a local restaurant for an early dinner and hopefully our phones will ring to tell us we won a tree!
item.name: The Festival of Trees
